tag_line: Stay curious, keep learning and keep growing
subTitle: create
favorites_quote: A little progress each day adds up to big results
bio_desc: My name is Simona and I am 3rd year Data Science and Artificial Intelligence student at Breda University of Applied Sciences.
My experiences include working on real-life client projects, which have provided me with practical insights and skills in these areas.
I am committed to continuous learning and growth, particularly in data engineering, data science, and software engineering.
I am eager to contribute and thrive in a dynamic environment, where I can collaborate with others and make meaningful contributions as part of a team.
I love connecting with others, sharing ideas, and working together to solve complex problems as a team. Collaboration is a big part of how I approach both learning and problem-solving.
